attributes.title: Interior Designer
attributes.subTitle: There is an open position for remote work
attributes.cardDescription: Dream to become an interior designer? RemotEmployees company requires a remote Interior designer as well as an Assistant Interior Designer. We cooperate with foreign companies, so a good command of a foreign language will be a great benefit.

attributes.shortDescription: Video editor, Illustrator, Visualizer, Design team lead, Architect, Retoucher, UI/UX, Motion designer, Interior designer
